name: LIMBS, UNITE!
description:
You control Blood and Bones. Gather material, unite, and withstand infected tissues. How to play

When separated, gather resources that will be both your defense and your projectiles. Come to your partner and unite in order to protect yourselves!

WASD - Blood's movement Arrows - Bones' movement E - unite (when close to the other half) / disunite LMB - shoot (united form, if enough material) Escape - pause game One projectile uses 1 piece of blood and 1 piece of bone. AUTHORS

Riptide - sound design, promo art
spoonsweet - in-game art, game design
John Ivess - coding, game design
